thread.title: Statement by United Union Coalition Regarding the Health Condition of United CEO Oscar Munoz
thread.title_full: Statement by United Union Coalition Regarding the Health Condition of United CEO Oscar Munoz - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Statement by United Union Coalition Regarding the Health Condition of United CEO Oscar Munoz
text:
International Brotherhood of Teamsters
WASHINGTON , Oct. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- On behalf of United's represented employees, we wish United CEO Oscar Munoz a quick and full recovery from the health setback he experienced on Thursday. Our thoughts are with Mr. Munoz and his family as they go through this difficult time.
We look forward to Mr. Munoz's return as we will continue working together for the betterment of the world's best airline.
Captain David Bourne
International Brotherhood of Teamsters
Captain Jay Heppner
UAL-Air Line Pilots Association
Ken Diaz
UAL-Association of Flight Attendants
Marcus Valentino
CAL-Association of Flight Attendants
Kathleen Domondon
CMI-Association of Flight Attendants
Craig Symons
Professional Airline Flight Control Association
Sara Nelson
Association of Flight Attendants-CWA
Mike Klemm
International Association of Machinists & Aerospace Workers
Contact:
Galen Munroe , (202) 624-6911
gmunroe@teamster.org
